title: Transcendent looking for dedicated gamers
body:
This team is being run as a leadership based team which I am the leader of. I do the shot calling, the in game strategy, including team comps, builds, ward setups and general laning phase style of play.

I am looking for players who are dedicated and want to commit their time and effort into a serious professional team looking to go big. If you want to join this team you have to trust what I am asking from you even if you do not agree with it. I will explain it all in depth if you want me to. We are going to be playing every night when possible from 5pm (sydney time) til late.

There is no rank requirements but you must have a mic and the ability to use teamspeak. I understand I am asking a lot from players but if everyone could keep the banter to a minimum thanks.


If you decide to trial, here are the 3 champions you WILL be playing in each role:


...........Ultimate...|.Sustain.|....Poke
Top:.......zilean...|..nasus....|.....jayce
mid:....morgana.|..swain...|....nidalee
jungle:...galio.....|..mundo.|...lee sin
adc:......twitch....|...ashe...|....ezreal
support:.kayle...|..soraka.|....janna

Each champion will be played within their team comp as specified above each 5.

IGN: whitepumah
Skype: whitepumah


PLEASE DO NOT ADD ME TO TELL ME HOW BAD YOU THINK I AM.

Either add me for a trial or don't add me at all.
Thank you.

replies.body:
"This team is being run as a leadership based team which I am the leader of. I do the shot calling, the in game strategy, including team comps, builds, ward setups and general laning phase style of play."

no one likes being bossed around, especially from a silver player, no thanks....

I am aware of this, but if players are willing to do this then I can give them the opportunity to play professionally.

So it is simply a matter of what players are willing to do to play professionally and overseas. I understand that due to the social and community standard that it would seem impossible to get that from a silver leader but I have already given information which negates those beliefs. Basically if something can happen no matter how it may seem at the time it can happen as long as it has what it needs to make it able to occur.
get diamond then talk about "playing professionally"
I am not going to repeat myself from others threads, it is purely up to the players who see this thread whether or not they want to take a chance with playing for my team.

i'm going to break out the harsh truth to you, no one will want to join your team because:

1) You're taking command and forcing people to do things that YOU want and forcing them to play champs that YOU chose 
2) No one wants to go pro with a silver 'leader'
3) You're silver
4) Your troll 'comps' are stupid and and will never work vs a meta team

{{champion:26}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:10}}  Looks just like a cluster%%%% of champions with absolutely no synergy that  a few  level 10 players chose.....

I know everyone thinks its troll, we have a positive win/loss ratio and we have been using trialers the whole time so we have never had a chance to get a full team together to practice it and use it properly.

When you play solo duo and want to win you want to be playing your best champion so why do you make people play champions that you like/think would be a team comp.

A good team comp would be but these could be champions that no one in your team is familiar with so you should re make your thread and say something like this

Gnar
Orianna
Lee Sin             
Thresh
Graves

or

Lissandra
Yasuo
J4
Leona
Corki

You should re make your thread and say something like this

Transcendent is looking for players

We are currently unranked and need to feel all positions, we will be using (what ever voice chat) and practicing every day if possible.

We currently have

In Top
Me WhitePumah in Mid lane
In Jungle
In Adc
In Support

If you could leave in the comments this. 

IGN:
RANK:
FAV ROLE:
AGE:
VOICE CHAT:
TIME AVAILABLE:

OR, i could make my thread as to accurately describe what is going to happen in the team so people dont waste their time trialing in a team they cant handle playing in. The team comps I have set up are purely for winning once the team is familiar with them. That is why my team will actually be practicing them.

You just don't understand it. No one will actually listen to some random that says you must play these champions in order for us to win, it doesn't work like that. Every single person mains that lane because they enjoy it and they play their favourite champions because they like them and succeed at them not because some random said this will make us win.

Forcing another person to do something that they don't want to do is just wrong, you should really open your eyes and see that team comps like sustain won't work because 

Sustain
1) It's very simple for the enemy team to buy morellonomicon and counter all your sustain
2) Darius to counter nasus
3) Mundo sucks at jungle
4) Ashe is out of the meta
5) Soraka is squishy and can only heal herself with q and if it's on cd she is basically screwed

Ultimate
1) Gailo jungle doesn't work and can be easily counter jungled
2) Zilean top is basically suicide
3) Kayle should be mid
4) Morgana should be support
5) Twitch is too squishy and is easily countered by more than half the adc's in the game

Poke
1) NO CC
2) NO CC
3) NO CC
4) NO CC
5) Janna is the only one with enough cc to keep them off you but if one enemy slips through your all dead because your all poke.
I have my team, thanks for the convo.
